TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExportAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies that a type, property, field, or method provides a particular export.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In the Attributed Programming Model, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute> declares that a part exports, or provides to the composition container, an object that fulfills a particular contract. During composition, parts with imports that have matching contracts will have those dependencies filled by the exported object.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute> can decorate either an entire class, or a property, field, or method of a class. If the entire class is decorated, an instance of the class is the exported object. If a member of a class is decorated, the exported object will be the value of the decorated member.
Whether or not a contract matches is determined primarily by the contract name and the contract type. For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute>.
## Examples The following example shows three classes decorated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute>, and three imports that match them.
[!code-csharp[ImportAndExport#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/importandexport/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ImportAndExport#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/importandexport/vb/module1.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, exporting the type or member marked with this attribute under the default contract name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The default contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on the property or field type, or on the type that is marked with this attribute.
Methods marked with this attribute must specify a contract name or a type by using either <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute.%23ctor%28System.String%29> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Type%29>.
The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string contractName) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: The contract name that is used to export the type or member marked with this attribute, or or an empty string ("") to use the default contract name.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, exporting the type or member marked with this attribute under the specified contract name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The default contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on the property or field type, or on the type that this is marked with this attribute.
Methods marked with this attribute must specify a contract name or a type by using either <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute.%23ctor%28System.String%29> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Type%29>.
The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type contractType) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: A type from which to derive the contract name that is used to export the type or member marked with this attribute, or to use the default contract name.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, exporting the type or member marked with this attribute under a contract name derived from the specified type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on `contractType`.
The default contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on the property or field type, or on the type that is marked with this attribute.
Methods marked with this attribute must specify a contract name or a type by using either <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute.%23ctor%28System.String%29> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Type%29>.
The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

Public Sub New (contractName As String, contractType As Type)

Docs.param: The contract name that is used to export the type or member marked with this attribute, or or an empty string ("") to use the default contract name.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, exporting the specified type under the specified contract name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContractName As String
public: property System::String ^ ContractName { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the contract name that is used to export the type or member marked with this attribute.
Docs.value: The contract name that is used to export the type or member marked with this attribute. The default value is an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContractType As Type
public: property Type ^ ContractType { Type ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the contract type that is exported by the member that this attribute is attached to.
Docs.value: The type of export that is be provided. The default value is , which means that the type will be obtained by looking at the type on the member that this export is attached to.
